import React, { useState } from 'react' import './style.css' import post1 from './Imgs/post1.png' import jetiLogo from '../Stories/Img/jetLogo.jpg' import { AiOutlineHeart , AiFillHeart} from 'react-icons/ai' import {BsChat} from 'react-icons/bs' import {FiSend} from 'react-icons/fi' import { Sidebar } from '../Sidebar' import { Stories } from '../Stories' export function Home() { const [likes, setLikes] = useState(100) const [liked, setLikedActive] = useState(false) function like() { if (liked) { setLikedActive(false) setLikes(likes-1) }else{ setLikedActive(true) setLikes(likes+1) } } const [comment, setComment] = useState(""); const onChange = (e) => { setComment(e.target.value); }; return(

  • jetimobi

    Curtido por: {likes} pessoas

    jet.office: {comment}
